meanings.sent1: The preapplied sticker was already on the package.
meanings.sent2: The preapplied sunscreen made it easy to protect my skin.
meanings.sent3: I found a preapplied bandage on the ground and used it as a temporary bookmark.
meanings.sent4: Her preapplied knowledge of the subject helped her excel in the class.
meanings.sent5: The preapplied paint on the walls gave the room a fresh look.

meanings.sent1: The preapplied label was already attached to the product.
meanings.sent2: The preapplied stamp saved time at the post office.
meanings.sent3: I discovered a preapplied sticker on my shoe, making me wonder where it came from.
meanings.sent4: His preapplied skills in coding impressed the hiring manager.
